getM3U8 #$pyFunction import re,requests,jsunpack def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): idlink=re.findall('iframe src="(.*?)"',page_data)[0] url=requests.get(idlink,cookies=Cookie_Jar,headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0','referer':'https://www.ver-deportes.online/canales-de-deportes-en-vivo-online'}).content stream=jsunpack.unpack(re.findall('(eval.*(?:m3u8|mp4).*)',url)[0]) link=re.findall('source:"(.*?)"',stream)[0] return link
